headline: Ask HN: Recommended Router for Home Office
description:
I am trying to be prepared for the eventual failure of my older Apple Time Capsule. It has been a pretty good router, done most of what I asked and functioned as a steadfast device for almost a decade. I don't foresee it breaking, but I would like to be prepared for the future. I am looking for router suggestions that have the following features:

1) No Wifi needed, I have a separate AP for that.

2) Have 1-2 2.5 Gb ports that don't require link aggregation if possible. One of my future goes is to try and get a home NAS that is capable of doing 2.5Gb.

3) Have 1-2 SFP+ ports so that I can connect a switch or two. Another future goal is to connect a couple of switches, one with PoE+ and one without, though I will admit this may not be necessary if I am not going the 10 Gb route which I am on the fence on.

4) Allow for 5-10 port forward entries and at least 20-30 MAC address reservations.

5) Rack mountable

I have been leaning towards MicroTik, in particular their new RB5009UG+S+IN

https://mikrotik.com/product/rb5009ug_s_in

However, I have no experience using their router OS and if it will provide the options I am looking for. Any thoughts would be appreciated.

Thank you!
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 推荐用于家庭办公室的路由器
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 推薦用於家庭辦公室的路由器
description_zh-Hans:
我正在努力为我的老式苹果时间胶囊的最终故障做好准备。它是一个相当好的路由器，完成了我所要求的大部分工作，作为一个稳定的设备运行了近十年。我没有预见到它会坏掉，但我想为未来做好准备。我正在寻找具有以下特点的路由器建议：

1）不需要Wifi，我有一个单独的AP。

2）有1-2个不需要链接聚合的2.5Gb端口，如果可能的话。我未来的目标之一是尝试获得一个能够进行2.5Gb的家用NAS。

3) 有1-2个SFP+端口，以便我可以连接一个或两个交换机。另一个未来的目标是连接几个交换机，一个有PoE+，一个没有，虽然我承认如果我不走10Gb的路线，这可能是没有必要的，我正在犹豫不决。

5）机架安装

我一直倾向于MicroTik，特别是他们新的RB5009UG+S+IN

https://mikrotik.com/product/rb5009ug_s_in

但是，我没有使用他们的路由器操作系统的经验，以及它是否能提供我所寻找的选项。如果有任何想法，我们将不胜感激。

谢谢您!
